member.name: M:Echoglossian.Echoglossian.LangIdentify(System.String)
member.summary: Detects which language the source text is in.
member.param: text to have the source language identified.

member.name: M:Echoglossian.Echoglossian.Translate(System.String)
member.summary: Translates the sentences passed to it. Uses Google Translate Free endpoint.
member.returns: Returns the translated text passed in the call parameter.
member.exception: Returns exception in case something goes wrong in the translation steps.

member.name: M:Echoglossian.Echoglossian.LanguageInfo.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: List of all the needed chars to be added.

member.name: M:Echoglossian.Echoglossian.DrawText(System.String,System.Drawing.Font,System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Color},System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Color},System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Size})
member.summary: Creates an image containing the given text. NOTE: the image should be disposed after use.
member.param: Font to use, defaults to Control.DefaultFont.
Minimum image size, defaults the size required to display the text.
member.returns: The image containing the text, which should be disposed after use.

member.name: M:Echoglossian.Echoglossian.TranslationImageConverter(System.Drawing.Image)
member.summary: Converts Image to byte array.
member.returns: Byte array to be used elsewhere.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to For now we only do auto-translations through Google Translate API, but in the future we intend to support other ML translation systems. We even have ideas targetting crowdsourced translations, curated by the community..
